thread.title: Voya Prime Rate Trust (NYSE: PPR) Dividend Declaration

author: cnbc.com
title: Voya Prime Rate Trust (NYSE: PPR) Dividend Declaration
text:
SCOTTSDALE, Ariz.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Voya Prime Rate Trust (NYSE: PPR):
TO: Interested Parties DATE: January 31, 2018 The following dividend information is for the 31 days of January for Voya Prime Rate Trust (CUSIP No. 92913A 10 0):
DIVIDEND: $0.023
Declaration Date: 1/31/2018
Ex. Date: 2/9/18
Record Date: 2/12/18
Payable Date: 2/23/18
Voya Investment Management Co. LLC
Dan Norman
7337 E. Doubletree Ranch Road
Managing Director
Scottsdale, AZ 85258
Phone: (480)477-2112
Fax: (480)477-2722
If you would like to receive this Dividend Declaration via email,
please email Bonnie.Dacier@voya.com
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180131006071/en/
Voya Prime Rate Trust
Dan Norman, 480-477-2112
Source: Voya Prime Rate Trust
